meta-review.comment: Headquarters World War II takes players on an unexpectedly deep and enjoyable dive into humanity's greatest conflict. Despite some initial appearance of poor strategy, the game opens up to beautiful gameplay once you start a new game. With tense engagements, nice tactical scenarios, and the ability to create custom battles, it offers a compact and engaging wargaming experience. The three factions feel suitably different, providing a wide range of combat scenarios to challenge players. If you love games similar to XCOM, this title is definitely worth a try.
